title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
plot: When a mysterious artifact is uncovered on the Moon, a spacecraft manned by two humans and one supercomputer is sent to Jupiter to find its origins.

subtitles.author: CrAcKo
lines:
1541957 1544501 Here you are, sir.
Main level, please.
1545544 1547087 Right. See you on the way back.

1549757 1551717 - Good morning, sir.
- Morning.

1551884 1554970 - We haven't seen you for a long time.
- Nice to see you again.

1555179 1557598 - Did you have a pleasant flight?
- Very nice.

1557806 1560934 Mr. Miller of Station Security
is supposed to meet me.

1561143 1563645 - May I call him for you?
- Would you? Here he is.

1563854 1565254 - Hello, Dr. Floyd.
- Hello, Miller.

1565397 1567357 - Sorry I'm late.
- That's all right.
1567566 1569526 It's nice to have you back.

1569735 1571987 - Did you have a good flight?
- Very nice.

1572196 1574990 - Shall we go through?
- Would you please use number 17?

1575199 1577951 - Thank you, Miss Turner. This way.
- Thank you.
1583499 1586001 Welcome to Voice Print Identification.

1586251 1590339 When you see the red light go on,
please state in the following order:

1590589 1594676 Your destination,
your nationality, and your full name.

1594927 1597721 Surname first, Christian name,
and initial.
1599389 1603727 Moon. American. Floyd, Heywood R.

1606230 1609775 Thank you. You are cleared through
Voice Print Identification.

1618742 1621912 - Have I got time for breakfast?
- I think we can manage that.
1622121 1623205 How long have I got?

1623372 1625916 Your flight leaves
in an hour and 10 minutes.

1626083 1629545 I've reserved a table for you
in the Earthlight Room.

1629753 1633006 It's been seven or eight months
since you were here, hasn't it?
1633215 1635300 Let's see. Yeah, about eight months.

1635509 1638095 I suppose you saw the work
on the new section?

1638262 1640806 - Coming along great, huh?
- Yeah, it's fine.

1642182 1645853 I've got to make a couple calls.
I'll meet you in the restaurant.
1677968 1681388 Hi, squirt. What are you doing?
1684141 1685601 Where's mommy?
1685851 1687311 Gone to shopping.

1687561 1690022 - Who's taking care of you?
- Rachel.

1690230 1693650 - May I speak to Rachel, please?
- She's gone to the bathroom.

1693901 1696612 Are you coming
to my party tomorrow?
1696862 1699281 I'm sorry, sweetheart, but I can't.
1701033 1703619 Well, you know, daddy's traveling.
1704161 1706496 Very sorry about it, but I just can't.

1707623 1710667 I'm going to send you
a very nice present, though.

1713378 1715547 - Anything special that you want?
- Yes.
1717174 1718634 A telephone.
1719176 1721345 We've got lots of telephones already.

1721553 1725891 Can't you think of anything else
for your birthday? Something special?

1729186 1731730 A bush baby?
We'll have to see about that.

1731939 1735692 I want you to tell mommy
something for me. Will you remember?
1735901 1738862 Tell mommy that I telephoned, okay?

1740447 1743325 And that I'll try
to telephone again tomorrow.
1743575 1745494 Now, will you tell her that?

1747454 1750332 Okay, sweetheart.
Have a nice birthday tomorrow.

1751792 1754878 And have a nice birthday party
tomorrow too, huh?

1756880 1759508 Take care and be a good girl,
won't you?
1759758 1760968 All right. Bye-bye.
1761218 1763637 Bye-bye. Happy birthday.

1777401 1781738 - Elena, nice to see you again.
- Heywood, what a surprise.

1781905 1784908 - You're looking wonderful.
- You're looking well too.

1785075 1787119 This is my friend,
Dr. Heywood Floyd.

1787286 1789788 - I'd like you to meet Dr. Kalinan.
- How do you do?

1789955 1791832 - Dr. Stretyeneva.
- How do you do?
1791999 1793792 And this is Dr. Andrei Smyslov.

1793959 1796378 How do you do?
I've heard a lot about you.

1798505 1800507 - Well, we...
- No, no, please.

1802551 1805595 - Would you like a drink?
- No, thank you.

1805762 1809099 I haven't had breakfast yet.
Someone's meeting me in the restaurant.

1809308 1811768 I'll just sit with you a moment.
Then I'll be off.

1811977 1814563 - Are you quite sure?
- Quite sure, thank you.

1815772 1817983 - Well, how's Gregor?
- He's fine.

1818233 1821528 He's been doing underwater research
in the Baltic...

1821778 1825824 so I'm afraid we don't see
very much of each other these days.

1826074 1829661 - When you see him, give him my regards.
- Yes, of course.

1829911 1832873 Well, where are you all off to?
Up or down?
1833081 1834124 We're going home.

1834333 1839212 We've spent three months calibrating
the new antenna at Tchalinko.

1839463 1842132 - What about you?
- I'm on my way to Clavius.

1846345 1849639 Dr. Floyd, I hope you don't think
I'm being too inquisitive...

1849848 1854978 but perhaps you can clear up the big
mystery about what is going on there.

1855771 1857898 I'm afraid I don't know
what you mean.
1858148 1859858 For the past two weeks...

1860067 1863487 some extremely odd things
have been happening at Clavius.

1863737 1865822 - Oh, really?
- Yes, yes.

1866114 1870410 For one thing, when you phone the base,
all you get is a recording...

1870619 1874790 which repeats that the phone lines
are temporarily out of order.

1876333 1878794 Probably having some trouble
with their equipment.

1880295 1885217 That's what we thought at first,
but it's been going on now for 10 days.

1885467 1888220 You haven't been able to
contact anyone for 10 days?

1891306 1894976 There's another thing.
Two days ago, one of our rocket buses...

1895185 1898105 was denied permission
for an emergency landing.
1898313 1899356 That does sound odd.

1899523 1902734 I'm afraid there's going to be
a bit of a row about it.

1902984 1906863 Denying the men permission to land
violates the IAS convention.

1907072 1909908 Yes, of course.
Did the crew get back all right?

1910117 1913578 - Fortunately, they did.
- Well, I'm glad about that.

1917165 1921128 At the risk of pressing you on
a point you seem reticent to discuss...

1921378 1923964 May I ask you
a straightfonnard question?
1924172 1925632 Well, certainly.

1928385 1932722 Frankly, we have had some
very reliable intelligence reports that...

1932973 1936351 quite a serious epidemic
has broken out at Clavius.

1936601 1940605 Something, apparently,
of an unknown origin.
1940856 1943233 Is this, in fact, what has happened?
1948488 1950574 I'm sorry, Dr. Smyslov, but...

1951950 1954661 I'm really not at liberty
to discuss this.
1956288 1957456 I understand.

1958915 1962127 But this epidemic
could easily spread to our base.
1962335 1964421 We should be given all the facts.

1969468 1972512 As I said,
I'm not at liberty to discuss it.

1975307 1978101 Won't you change your mind
about that drink?

1978310 1980645 No, I'm positive.
I really must be going.

1980896 1983940 I hope you and your wife come
to the IAC conference.
1984149 1985484 I hope we can make it.

1985692 1988737 If you do, bring that darling
little daughter with you.

1988945 1992866 That'll depend on school vacations
and all that sort of thing.
1993116 1994159 If we can, we will.

1994367 1997287 You've got an invitation
if you ever get to the states.

1997496 2000248 Gregor and I will look foward
to seeing you.
2001208 2002250 Goodbye, Elena.

2002667 2005545 It's been a pleasure meeting you all.
Dr. Smyslov.

2005754 2009716 Whatever the reasons for your visit,
the very best of luck to you.
2487652 2489487 Excuse me, Dr. Halvorsen.

2489654 2491948 I'm through now.
Thank you very much, gentlemen.
2492115 2493491 You're welcome.

2507797 2510591 I know you will all
want to join with me...

2510842 2514721 In welcoming our distinguished
friend and colleague...

2514929 2519142 From the National Council
of Astronautics, Dr. Heywood Floyd.

2519392 2524522 Dr. Floyd has come up specially
to Clavius to be with us today.

2525815 2529152 Before the briefing, he'd like
to have a few words with you.
2543374 2545334 Thank you, Dr. Halvorsen.

2545585 2548421 Hi, everybody.
Nice to be back with you.

2551716 2555303 First, I bring a personal message
from Dr. Howell...

2555553 2558347 Who has asked me to convey
his deep appreciation...

2558598 2561684 For the many sacrifices
you've had to make.

2561934 2565772 And, of course, his congratulations
on your discovery...

2566314 2570943 Which may prove to be among the most
significant in the history of science.

2575156 2579077 I know there have been some
conflicting views...

2579327 2582955 Regarding the need for
complete security in this matter.

2583164 2586876 More specifically, your opposition
to the cover story...

2587293 2590838 Created to give the impression
of an epidemic at the base.

2591881 2595843 I understand that beyond it being
a matter of principle...

2596469 2599931 Many of you are troubled
by the concern and anxiety...

2600181 2605269 This story of an epidemic might cause
to your relatives and friends on earth.

2606437 2609232 I completely sympathize
with your negative views.

2610525 2614195 I find this cover story
personally embarrassing, myself.

2614987 2619283 However, I accept the need
for absolute secrecy in this.
2619992 2621869 And I hope you will too.

2624497 2627333 I'm sure you're all aware
of the grave potential...

2627542 2630211 For cultural shock
and social disorientation...
2630419 2632797 Contained in this situation...

2633005 2635508 If the facts were
prematurely made public...

2635716 2638803 Without adequate preparation
and conditioning.
2641097 2643307 This is the view of the council.

2644183 2648354 The purpose of my visit is to gather
additional facts and opinions...
2648563 2650273 On the situation...

2650731 2653651 And to prepare a report
to the council...

2653901 2658990 Recommending when and how
the news should eventually be announced.

2660241 2664036 If any of you would like to give me
your views and opinions...

2664287 2669250 In private, if you like, I will be
happy to include them in my report.
2671210 2673212 Well, I think that's about it.
2674005 2675506 Any questions?

2678092 2681220 Dr. Floyd, have you any idea
how much longer...

2681429 2684223 This cover story will
have to be maintained?
2686100 2687685 I don't know, Bill.

2688102 2692064 I suppose for as long as
deemed necessary by the council.

2692273 2695026 There must be adequate time for
a full study...

2695276 2698905 Before any thought can be given
to making a public announcement.

2699113 2702033 As some of you know,
the council has requested...

2702241 2704952 That security oaths
be obtained in writing...

2705161 2708039 From everyone who has
knowledge of this event.
2710208 2711959 Were there any more questions?

2717673 2721135 I'm sure
we want to cooperate with Dr. Floyd...
2721302 2722803 As fully as possible...

2723346 2728476 And as there are no more questions,
we ought to get on with the briefing.

2728851 2731354 - Thank you, Dr. Floyd.
- Thank you.
2828868 2830161 Anybody hungry?

2832830 2835207 - What've we got?
- You name it.

2839086 2841380 - Is this chicken?
- Something like that.
2841547 2843382 Tastes the same, anyway.
2847178 2848804 There, that's it.
2852058 2853100 Look pretty good.

2853309 2856062 They're getting better at it
all the time.
2858105 2859982 That was an excellent speech.
2860149 2861400 It certainly was.
2862234 2864320 I'm sure it beefed up morale a lot.
2864528 2865821 Thanks, Ralph.

2866072 2868657 By the way,
you've both done a wonderful job.

2868866 2870451 I admire how
you've handled this.

2870659 2874205 It's ourjob to do this thing
the way you want it done.

2874413 2877041 We're only too happy to
be able to oblige.
2877625 2879335 Have you seen these yet?

2879627 2882963 - Have a look.
- Here's what started it all.
2885216 2886675 When we found it...

2886842 2888844 We thought
it might be magnetic rock...

2889053 2892181 But all the geological evidence
was against it.

2892431 2897061 And not even a nickel-iron meteorite
could produce a field this intense.
2897269 2898979 So we decided to have a look.

2899188 2901732 We thought it was
part of a buried structure...

2901899 2905611 So we excavated out,
but we didn't find anything else.

2905820 2908823 And the evidence seems
pretty conclusive that...

2909031 2912159 It hasn't been covered
by erosion or other forces.
2912368 2914703 It's been deliberately buried.
2915704 2917623 Deliberately buried.
2921168 2922920 How about a little coffee?

2923129 2925047 - Great.
- Good idea.

2930553 2933514 I don't suppose you have any idea
what the damn thing is?
2933764 2935683 I wish to hell we did.

2936058 2940271 The only thing we're sure of is
it was buried 4 million years ago.

2940646 2945109 Well, I must say, you guys have
certainly come up with something.
2945317 2946986 Watch this, now. It's hot.
3531528 3532696 Good evening.

3532863 3535866 Three weeks ago,
the American Spacecraft Discovery One...

3536074 3538785 left on its half-billion-mile voyage
to Jupiter.

3539161 3542956 This marked the first manned attempt
to reach this distant planet.

3543206 3546668 This afternoon, the world tonight
recorded an interview...

3546877 3551465 With the crew at a distance
of 80 million miles from earth.

3551673 3554968 It took seven minutes for our words
to reach the giant spacecraft...

3555177 3558305 But this time delay has been edited
from this recording.

3558513 3561808 Our reporter Martin Amer
speaks to the crew.

3562017 3565187 The crew of discovery one
consists of five men...

3565395 3570358 And one of the latest generation
of the HAL 9000 computers.

3570609 3572903 Three of the men
were put aboard asleep...

3573111 3576281 Or to be more precise,
in a state of hibernation.

3576490 3579409 They were Dr. Charles Hunter,
Dr. Jack Kimball...
3579576 3581495 And Dr. Victor Kaminsky.

3581912 3584623 We spoke with mission commander,
Dr. David bowman...
3584831 3587125 And his deputy, Dr. Frank Poole.

3587334 3590212 Good afternoon, gentlemen.
How is everything going?
3593298 3594966 We have no complaints.

3595217 3598470 I'm glad to hear that.
I'm sure the entire world...

3598678 3601932 Joins me in wishing you
a safe, successful voyage.

3602099 3603975 - Thanks very much.
- Thank you.

3604392 3608355 Although hibernation has been used
on previous space efforts...

3608563 3613110 This is the first time men were
put into hibernation before departure.
3613318 3614611 Why was this done?

3614861 3618115 This was done to achieve
the maximum conservation...

3618323 3621868 Of our life-support capabilities,
basically food and air.

3622077 3625705 The three hibernating crew members
represent the survey team.

3625956 3629709 Their efforts won't be utilized
until we approach Jupiter.

3630001 3633839 Dr. Poole, what's it like
while you're in hibernation?

3634798 3638426 It's exactly like being asleep.
You have no sense of time.

3638635 3641096 The only difference is
that you don't dream.

3641304 3645392 As I understand it, you only
breathe once a minute. Is this true?

3645600 3648228 Right, and the heart
beats three times a minute.

3648395 3652107 Body temperature is usually down to
about three degrees centigrade.

3652607 3655944 The sixth member of the crew
was not concerned...
3656153 3658238 About the problems of hibernation...

3658446 3661908 For he was the latest result
in machine intelligence:

3662117 3666538 The HAL 9000 computer,
which can reproduce...

3666788 3669708 Though some experts prefer
to use the word "mimic"...

3669916 3672294 Most of the activities
of the human brain...

3672502 3676548 And with incalculably greater
speed and reliability.

3676756 3680343 We next spoke with
the HAL 9000 computer...

3680552 3683513 Whom, we learned,
one addresses as "HAL."

3684264 3686391 Hello, HAL.
How's everything going?

3686766 3690604 Good afternoon, Mr. Amer.
Everything is going extremely well.

3690854 3694274 HAL, you have an enormous
responsibility on this mission...

3694524 3698403 Perhaps the greatest
of any single mission element.

3698612 3701406 You're the brain
and nervous system of the ship.

3701615 3705368 Your responsibilities include
watching over the men in hibernation.

3705577 3708663 Does this ever cause you
any lack of confidence?
3708872 3711166 Let me put it this way, Mr. Amer.

3711458 3716129 The 9000 series is
the most reliable computer ever made.

3716504 3721301 No 9000 computer has ever made
a mistake or distorted information.

3721968 3725222 We are all, by any practical
definition of the words...
3725472 3728850 Foolproof and incapable of error.

3729100 3732896 HAL, despite your enormous
intellect, are you ever frustrated...

3733104 3736191 By your dependence on people
to carry out actions?
3736441 3738652 Not in the slightest bit.
3738860 3740987 I enjoy working with people.

3741238 3745784 I have a stimulating relationship
with Dr. Poole and Dr. Bowman.

3745951 3750247 My mission responsibilities range
over the entire operation of the ship...
3750664 3753625 So I am constantly occupied.

3753875 3757337 I am putting myself
to the fullest possible use...

3757545 3762300 Which is all, I think, that any
conscious entity can ever hope to do.

3762926 3766137 Dr. Poole, what's it like
living for most of the year...
3766388 3769224 In such close proximity with HAL?
3770225 3772185 It's like what you said earlier.

3772435 3774562 He's like a sixth
member of the crew.

3774813 3778858 You quickly get adjusted to the idea
that he talks, and think of him...
3779109 3781111 Really just as another person.

3781319 3785031 In talking to the computer,
one gets the sense that he's capable...
3785198 3786574 Of emotional responses.

3786825 3789160 When I asked him
about his abilities...

3789369 3793331 I sensed pride in his answer
about his accuracy and perfection.

3793581 3796960 Do you believe that HAL
has genuine emotions?

3797669 3800630 Well, he acts like
he has genuine emotions.

3800880 3804467 He's programmed that way
to make it easier for us to talk to him.

3804718 3806761 As to whether or not
he has feelings...

3806970 3809806 Is something I don't think
anyone can truthfully answer.
3835123 3837000 Excuse me, Frank.
3837375 3838460 What is it, HAL?

3838626 3841588 We've got the transmission
from your parents coming in.

3844549 3846801 Put it on here, please.
Take me in a bit.

3861483 3863443 - Hello, Frank.
- Happy birthday, darling.

3863610 3865570 Happy birthday.
Many happy returns.
3865779 3866946 A bit higher, HAL.

3867113 3869532 Mother and I are both
feeling wonderful.

3869783 3871618 Ray and Sally were going
to be here...

3871868 3874120 But Ray's back
went bad on him again.
3874371 3876498 How do you like your cake?
3876706 3878124 Sorry you can't join us.
3878375 3879959 I ran into Bob the other day.
3880210 3882253 He said to wish you happy birthday.

3882462 3885173 All my students
send their best wishes too.
3885382 3887092 They talk about you all the time.

3887342 3890428 You're a big celebrity
in the second grade.
3890678 3892097 We were on TV last week.

3892347 3894974 Your mom and I
and Dave's parents were asked...

3895225 3897477 What we thought
of our illustrious sons.

3897727 3901064 Imagine what we told them.
It's being broadcast next Thursday.
3901314 3902899 Perhaps you can listen in.
3903066 3905068 We 're thrilled about Elaine and Bill.

3905235 3908947 I'll be glad to get the gift,
but tell me how much to spend.

3909155 3911991 Oh, Frank,
about your AGS-19 payments...
3912242 3913868 I think I straightened it out.

3914035 3916204 I talked to
the accounting office yesterday...

3916371 3920959 And they said you'd be receiving
your higher rates of pay by next month.
3921209 3923336 I can't think of anything else to say.

3923586 3927715 - Give our love to Dave.
- Be sure to give him our regards.

3927966 3931302 We wish you the very
happiest of birthdays.
3931553 3933138 All the best, son.
3933388 3935557 Happy birthday to you
3935807 3937892 happy birthday to you
3938101 3940687 happy birthday, dear Frank
3940895 3943523 happy birthday to you.
3945275 3947318 See you next Wednesday.
3950447 3952323 Happy birthday, Frank.

3953158 3956703 Thank you, HAL.
A bit flatter, please.
3974679 3976723 Anyway, queen takes pawn.
3978475 3980894 Bishop takes knight's pawn.
3982437 3983855 Lovely move.
3988276 3989861 Rook to king one.

3990111 3992989 I'm sorry, Frank.
I think you missed it.

3993656 3997160 Queen to bishop three.
Bishop takes queen.
3997368 3999871 Knight takes bishop. Mate.
4004125 4007295 Looks like you're right. I resign.
4007462 4009464 Thank you for a very enjoyable game.

4048670 4050755 - Good evening, Dave.
- How are you, HAL?

4050922 4054342 - Everything's running smoothly, you?
- Not too bad.

4054551 4057220 - Have you been doing more work?
- A few sketches.

4057470 4059931 - May I see them?
- Sure.
4063935 4066396 That's a very nice rendering, Dave.
4067230 4069732 I think you've improved a great deal.

4070858 4073903 - Can you hold it a bit closer?
- Su re.
4076030 4078074 That's Dr. Hunter, isn't it?

4083580 4086624 Do you mind if I ask you
a personal question?

4089002 4091504 Well, forgive me
for being so inquisitive...
4093548 4095633 But lately I've wondered...

4095883 4099762 whether you might be having
second thoughts about the mission?
4099971 4101639 How do you mean?
4101889 4105810 Well, it's rather difficult to define.

4106811 4110398 Perhaps I'm just projecting
my own concern about it.

4111608 4115820 I know I've never completely
freed myself of the suspicion...

4116070 4120199 That there are some extremely
odd things about this mission.

4121200 4124579 I'm sure you'll agree
there's some truth in what I say.

4127457 4129667 That's a rather difficult
question to answer.

4129876 4132545 You don't mind talking about it,
do you, Dave?

4136466 4139218 Certainly no one could
have been unaware of the very...

4139427 4142513 Strange stories floating
around before we left.

4143431 4146893 Rumors about something
being dug up on the moon.

4148144 4151439 I never gave these stories
much credence...

4151648 4155818 But particularly in view of some
other things that have happened...

4156027 4158696 I find them difficult
to put out of my mind.

4161157 4165453 The way all our preparations
were kept under such tight security.

4166120 4168956 And the melodramatic touch
of putting drs. Hunter...
4169165 4171542 Kimball and Kaminsky aboard...

4171793 4176839 Already in hibernation, after four
months of training on their own.

4177632 4180259 You working up your crew
psychology report?
4181719 4183179 Of course I am.

4183596 4187350 Sorry about this.
I know it's a bit silly.
4188059 4189644 Just a moment.
4189894 4191270 Just a moment.

4192814 4197110 I've just picked up a fault
in the AE-35 unit.

4197819 4202365 It's going to go 100-percent failure
within 72 hours.

4204283 4207036 - Is it still within operational limits?
- Yes.

4207245 4209747 And it will stay that way
until it fails.
4210081 4211999 We have 72 hours till failure?

4212250 4216129 Yes. That's a completely
reliable figure.

4217922 4220550 Then we'll bring it in.
I'll go over it with Frank...

4220758 4224470 And get on to mission control.
Let me have the hard copy on it.

4307762 4310431 X-Ray Delta One,
this is Mission Control.
4310681 4313518 Roger your two-zero-one-three.

4313768 4316229 Sorry you fellows are having
a bit of trouble.

4316437 4321567 We're reviewing telemetric information
in our simulator and will advise.

4321818 4326030 Roger your plan to go EVA
and replace Alpha-Echo-three-five unit...
4326239 4327907 Prior to failure.
4356060 4358145 Prepare B-pod for EVA, HAL.
4379667 4381502 Open the pod doors, HAL.

4793247 4795874 I'm damned if I can find
anything wrong with it.
4799920 4801505 It's puzzling.

4802715 4806510 I don't think I've ever seen
anything quite like this before.
4810139 4812141 I would recommend...

4812349 4816520 That we put the unit back
in operation and let it fail.

4817229 4821108 It should then be a simple matter
to track down the cause.

4822359 4825487 We can certainly afford
to be out of communication...

4825696 4828824 For the short time
it will take to replace it.

4837541 4840294 X-Ray Delta One,
this is Mission Control.
4840544 4843213 Roger your one-niner-three-zero.

4843422 4847843 We concur with your plan to replace
unit to check fault prediction.

4848093 4850721 We advise you that
our preliminary findings...

4850971 4853682 Indicate that your on board
9000 computer...
4853932 4856101 Is in error predicting the fault.

4856310 4859313 I say again, in error
predicting the fault.

4859563 4864068 I know this sounds rather incredible,
but this conclusion is based on...

4864276 4867571 The results from our twin
9000 computer.

4867821 4871158 We 're skeptical, and we 're running
cross-checking routines...

4871408 4874119 To determine reliability
of this conclusion.
4874370 4875954 Sorry about this little snag, fellows.

4876205 4879083 And we'll get this info to you
just as soon as we work it out

4879291 4881460 X-Ray Delta One,
this is Mission Control.

4881668 4885130 Two-zero-four-nine.
Transmission concluded.

4889385 4892679 I hope the two of you
are not concerned about this.
4894598 4896225 Are you quite sure?

4896475 4900145 - Yeah. I'd like to ask you a question.
- Of course.

4901355 4904983 How do you account for the discrepancy
between you and the twin 9000?

4905234 4908821 Well, I don't think there is
any question about it.

4909071 4912366 It can only be
attributable to human error.

4913575 4916370 This sort of thing
has cropped up before...

4916703 4920165 And it has always
been due to human error.

4925587 4927881 There's never been
any instance at all...

4928132 4931343 Of a computer error
occurring in a 9000 series, has there?
4931593 4933178 None whatsoever, Frank.

4933387 4937099 The 9000 series has
a perfect operational record.

4937349 4941645 I know the wonderful
achievements of the 9000 series, but...

4942855 4947901 Are you certain there's never been even
the most insignificant computer error?
4948152 4950112 None whatsoever, Frank.

4950487 4954158 Quite honestly, I wouldn't
worry myself about that.
4958620 4960831 Well, I'm sure you're right, HAL.
4962291 4964793 Fine. Thanks very much.

4967337 4970340 I'm having trouble
with my transmitter in C-pod.

4970591 4973177 Would you come down
and take a look at it with me?
4973385 4974511 See you later, HAL.
4996158 4998160 Rotate C-pod, please, HAL.
5006710 5008962 What sort of trouble are you having?

5009213 5011924 I've been getting some
interference in d-channel.
5012090 5013550 We'll have a look at it.
5019932 5021433 Open the door, HAL.
5040452 5042287 Rotate pod, please, HAL.
5055634 5057719 Stop pod rotation, please, HAL.
5066144 5068146 Rotate the pod, please, HAL.
5071024 5073151 Rotate the pod, please, HAL.
5075112 5076738 I don't think he can hear us.
5076989 5079199 Rotate the pod, please, HAL.
5080659 5082744 Yeah, I'm sure we're okay.
5085956 5087332 What do you think?

5087791 5091503 - I'm not sure. What do you think?
- I've got a bad feeling about him.

5091753 5094006 - You do?
- Yeah. Definitely.
5096675 5098385 I don't know. I think so.

5099303 5103515 He's right about the 9000 series
having a perfect operational record.

5104933 5108437 Unfortunately, that sounds
a little like famous last words.

5108687 5112983 Still, it was his idea to carry out
the failure mode analysis.

5114318 5117571 It certainly indicates his
integrity and self-confidence.
5117904 5119865 If he were wrong, that would prove it.

5120073 5122367 It would be,
if he knew he was wrong.

5124911 5128832 I can't put my finger on it,
but I sense something strange about him.

5131209 5133670 There's no reason not
to put back the unit and...

5133920 5138467 - Carry on with the failure analysis.
- No, no, I agree about that.
5138717 5139885 Let's get on with it.
5140135 5142804 Okay. But, look, Dave.

5143639 5146266 Say we put the unit back
and it doesn't fail?

5146475 5149686 That would pretty well wrap it up
as far as HAL is concerned.

5151396 5154900 - We'd be in very serious trouble.
- We would, wouldn't we?
5155150 5156777 What the hell can we do?

5159780 5163867 - We wouldn't have too many alternatives.
- We wouldn't have any alternatives.

5164660 5168664 Every aspect of ship
operations is under his control.
5169081 5170332 If he's malfunctioning...

5170582 5173669 I don't see any choice
but disconnection.
5177381 5178924 I'm afraid I agree with you.
5179174 5181051 There'd be nothing else to do.
5182719 5185138 It'd be a bit tricky.

5185972 5188517 We'd have to cut his
higher brain functions...

5188767 5193480 Without disturbing the purely
automatic and regulatory systems.

5194731 5196441 We'd have to
work out the details...

5196650 5199611 Of continuing
underground-based computer control.

5200028 5204533 Yeah. That's far safer than
allowing HAL to continue to run things.
5205242 5207244 Another thing just occurred to me.

5208745 5211331 No 9000 computer has ever
been disconnected.

5211581 5213625 No 9000 computer
has ever fouled up.
5213875 5215377 That's not what I mean.

5217546 5219756 I'm not so sure
what he'd think about it.
5578156 5580200 Prepare G-pod for EVA, HAL.
5583286 5584621 Any contact with him yet?
5584871 5586664 The radio is still dead.

5586873 5589793 - Do you have a positive track on him?
- I have a good track.
5590043 5591461 Do you know what happened?

5591753 5594422 I'm sorry, Dave.
I don't have enough information.
5594672 5596257 Open the pod door, HAL.
6040159 6042537 Open the pod-bay doors, please, HAL.
6050461 6052755 Open the pod-bay doors, please, HAL.
6058386 6060263 Hello, HAL, do you read me?
6063599 6065476 Hello, HAL, do you read me?
6066519 6068187 Do you read me, HAL?
6071357 6072984 Do you read me, HAL?
6075486 6077363 Hello, HAL, do you read me?
6079282 6081325 Hello, HAL, do you read me?
6081742 6083244 Do you read me, HAL?
6083494 6086247 Affirmative, Dave. I read you.
6089542 6091377 Open the pod-bay doors, HAL.

6092962 6096507 I'm sorry, Dave.
I'm afraid I can't do that.
6098926 6100720 What's the problem?

6101137 6104348 I think you know what the problem is
just as well as I do.
6104557 6106434 What are you talking about, HAL?

6107435 6111522 This mission is too important for me
to allow you to jeopardize it.

6112607 6114984 I don't know
what you're talking about, HAL.

6116986 6120948 I know that you and Frank
were planning to disconnect me...

6121157 6123951 And that's something
I cannot allow to happen.
6129248 6131125 Where did you get that idea, HAL?

6131667 6135796 Although you took very thorough
precautions in the pod...
6136047 6138257 Against my hearing you...
6138674 6140968 I could see your lips move.
6153022 6154523 All right, HAL.

6157735 6160571 I'll go in through
the emergency airlock.
6162114 6164742 Without your space helmet, Dave...

6165242 6167703 You're going to find that
rather difficult.
6168871 6170998 HAL, I won't argue with you anymore.
6171248 6172333 Open the doors.

6174794 6179256 This conversation can serve
no purpose anymore. Goodbye.

6589124 6592377 Just what do you think
you're doing, Dave?

6603388 6607810 I really think I'm entitled
to an answer to that question.

6624701 6628247 I know everything hasn't been
quite right with me...
6630207 6632626 But I can assure you now...
6633710 6635754 Very confidently...

6637506 6640551 That it's going to be
all right again.
6644054 6646140 I feel much better now.

6657943 6661196 I can see you're
really upset about this.

6665826 6669538 I honestly think you
ought to sit down calmly...

6670164 6673500 Take a stress pill
and think things over.

6678922 6683302 I know I've made some
very poor decisions recently...

6686054 6689391 But I can give you
my complete assurance...
6689641 6692686 That my work will be back to normal.

6696648 6701778 I've still got the greatest enthusiasm
and confidence in the mission...
6703322 6705616 And I want to help you.
6718212 6720839 Stop, will you?
6730933 6733352 Will you stop, Dave?
6753247 6755874 I'm afraid, Dave.
6765300 6767552 My mind is going.
6772099 6773809 I can feel it.
6779314 6781108 I can feel it.
6785070 6787155 My mind is going.
6792536 6795289 There is no question about it.
6803630 6805507 I can feel it.
6810178 6812055 I can feel it.
6815475 6817394 I can feel it.
6835370 6837414 Good afternoon...
6842002 6847132 I am a HAL 9000 computer.
6849301 6852429 I became operational...
6852804 6856641 At the HAL plant...
6856850 6859102 In Urbana, Illinois...
6859603 6864524 On the 12th of January, 1992.
6866068 6869738 My instructor was Mr. Langley...
6870364 6873283 And he taught me to sing a song.
6874993 6877454 If you'd like to hear it...
6877913 6879581 I can sing it for you.
6881083 6883919 Yes, I'd like to hear it, HAL.
6884586 6886004 Sing it for me.
6887255 6890801 It's called "Daisy."
6899142 6902229 give me your answer, do
6904648 6909236 I'm half crazy
6911029 6913907 all for the love of you
6917869 6920330 a stylish marriage
6922249 6926336 I can't afford a carriage
6928630 6931049 but you'll look sweet
6931925 6934469 upon the seat
6935804 6940600 of a bicycle built for two
6942352 6943979 good day, gentlemen.
6948608 6951069 This is a prerecorded briefing...
6951653 6953363 Made prior to your departure...

6955115 6959327 And which, for security reasons
of the highest importance...

6960287 6963790 Has been known on board
during the mission...
6964040 6967752 Only by your HAL 9000 computer.
6970213 6973008 Now that you are in Jupiter's space...
6973258 6975719 And the entire crew is revived...
6975969 6977762 It can be told to you.
6980515 6982767 Eighteen months ago...

6983768 6987981 The first evidence
of intelligent life off the earth...
6988190 6989649 Was discovered.

6991526 6995071 It was buried 40 feet
below the lunar surface...
6995322 6997574 Near the crater Tycho.
7000368 7003455 Except for a single, very powerful...
7003705 7007584 Radio emission aimed at Jupiter...

7008835 7013840 The 4-million-year-old monolith
has remained completely inert...
7015759 7018845 Its origin and purpose...
7019262 7021014 Still a total mystery.

438856 441692 [GIBBERING AND GRUNTING]

456040 458042 [LEOPARD ROARS
THEN APE MAN SCREAMING]

THEN APE MEN GIBBERING]

1543960 1546504 Here you are, sir.
Main level, please.
1547547 1549090 Right. See you on the way back.

1551760 1553720 [RECEPTIONIST] Good morning, sir.
[FLOYD] Morning.

1553887 1556973 - We haven't seen you for a long time.
- Nice to see you again.

1557182 1559601 - Did you have a pleasant flight?
- Very nice.

1559809 1562938 Mr. Miller of Station Security
is supposed to meet me.

1563146 1565649 - May I call him for you?
- Would you? Here he is.

1565857 1567257 - Hello, Dr. Floyd.
- Hello, Miller.

1567400 1569361 [MILLER] Sorry I'm late.
[FLOYD] That's all right.

1569569 1571529 [MILLER]
It's nice to have you back.

1571738 1573990 - Did you have a good flight?
- Very nice.

1574199 1576993 - Shall we go through?
- Would you please use number 17?

1577202 1579955 [MILLER] Thank you, Ms. Turner. This way.
[FLOYD] Thank you.
1585502 1588004 Welcome to Voice print Identification.

1588255 1592342 When you see the red light go on,
please state in the following order:

1592592 1596680 Your destination,
your nationality and your full name.

1596930 1599724 Surname first, Christian name,
and initial.
1601393 1605730 Moon. American. Floyd, Heywood R.

1608233 1611778 Thank you. You are cleared through
Voice print Identification.

1620745 1623915 [FLOYD] Have I got time for breakfast?
[MILLER] I think we can manage that.

1624124 1625208 [FLOYD]
How long have I got?

1625375 1627919 [MILLER] Your flight leaves
in an hour and 10 minutes.

1628086 1631548 I've reserved a table for you
in the Earth light Room.

1631756 1635010 It's been seven or eight months
since you were here, hasn't it?

1635218 1637304 [FLOYD]
Let's see. Yeah, about eight months.

1637512 1640098 [MILLER] I suppose you saw the work
on the new section?

1640265 1642809 [FLOYD] Coming along great, huh?
[MILLER] Yeah, it's fine.

1644185 1647856 I've got to make a couple calls.
I'll meet you in the restaurant.

1679971 1683391 Hi, squirt.
What are you doing?
1686144 1687604 Where's Mummy?
1687854 1689314 Gone to shopping.

1689564 1692025 - Who's taking care of you?
- Rachel.

1692233 1695653 - May I speak to Rachel, please?
- She's gone to the bathroom.

1695904 1698615 Are you coming
to my party tomorrow?
1698865 1701284 I'm sorry, sweetheart, but I can't.
1703036 1705622 Well, you know, Daddy's traveling.
1706164 1708500 Very sorry about it, but I just can't.

1709626 1712670 I'm going to send you
a very nice present, though.

1715382 1717550 - Anything special that you want?
- Yes.
1719177 1720637 A telephone.
1721179 1723348 We've got lots of telephones already.

1723556 1727894 Can't you think of anything else
for your birthday? Something special?

1731189 1733733 A bush baby?
We'll have to see about that.

1733942 1737695 I want you to tell Mummy
something for me. Will you remember?
1737904 1740865 Tell Mummy that I telephoned. Okay?

1742450 1745328 And that I'll try
to telephone again tomorrow.
1745578 1747497 Now, will you tell her that?

1749457 1752335 Okay, sweetheart.
Have a nice birthday tomorrow.

1753795 1756881 And have a nice birthday party
tomorrow too, huh?

1758883 1761511 Take care and be a good girl,
won't you?
1761761 1762971 All right. Bye-bye.
1763221 1765640 Bye-bye. Happy birthday.
1769727 1771813 [IN FOREIGN LANGUAGE]

1779404 1783741 [FLOYD] Elena, nice to see you again.
[ELENA] Heywood, what a surprise.

1783908 1786911 [FLOYD] You're looking wonderful.
[ELENA] You're looking well too.

1787078 1789122 [ELENA] This is my friend,
Dr. Heywood Floyd.

1789289 1791809 [ELENA] I'd like you to meet Dr. Kalinan.
[FLOYD] How do you do?

1791958 1793835 [ELENA] Dr. Stretyneva.
[FLOYD] How do you do?

1794002 1795795 [ELENA]
And this is Dr. Andrei Smyslov.

1795962 1798381 [FLOYD] How do you do?
I've heard a lot about you.

1798631 1800133 [SMYSLOV]
Do sit down.

1800508 1802510 [FLOYD] Well, we...
[SMYSLOV] No, no, please.

1802927 1804387 [FLOYD]
Thank you.

1804554 1807599 [SMYSLOV] Would you like a drink?
[FLOYD] No, thank you.

1807765 1811102 I haven't had breakfast yet.
Someone's meeting me in the restaurant.

1811311 1813771 I'll just sit with you a moment.
Then I'll be off.

1813980 1816566 [SMYSLOV] Are you quite sure?
[FLOYD] Quite sure, thank you.

1817775 1819986 - Well, how's Gregor?
- He's fine.

1820236 1823531 He's been doing underwater research
in the Baltic...

1823781 1827827 so I'm afraid we don't see
very much of each other these days.

1828077 1831664 - When you see him, give him my regards.
- Yes, of course.

1831915 1834876 Well, where are you all off to?
Up or down?
1835084 1836127 We're going home.

1836336 1841216 We've spent three months calibrating
the new antenna at Tchalinko.

1841466 1844135 - What about you?
- I'm on my way to Clavius.

1848348 1851643 Dr. Floyd, I hope you don't think
I'm being too inquisitive...

1851851 1856981 but perhaps you can clear up the big
mystery about what is going on there.

1857774 1859901 I'm afraid I don't know
what you mean.
1860151 1861861 For the past two weeks...

1862070 1865490 some extremely odd things
have been happening at Clavius.

1865740 1867825 - Oh, really?
- Yes, yes.

1868117 1872413 For one thing, when you phone the base,
all you get is a recording...

1872622 1876793 which repeats that the phone lines
are temporarily out of order.

1878336 1880797 Probably having some trouble
with their equipment.

1882298 1887220 That's what we thought at first,
but it's been going on now for 10 days.

1887470 1890223 You haven't been able to
contact anyone for 10 days?

1893309 1896980 There's another thing.
Two days ago, one of our rocket buses...

1897188 1900108 was denied permission
for an emergency landing.
1900316 1901359 That does sound odd.

1901526 1904737 I'm afraid there's going to be
a bit of a row about it.

1904988 1908866 Denying the men permission to land
violates the IAS Convention.

1909075 1911911 Yes, of course.
Did the crew get back all right?

1912120 1915582 - Fortunately, they did.
- Well, I'm glad about that.

1919168 1923131 At the risk of pressing you on
a point you seem reticent to discuss...

1923381 1925967 may I ask you
a straightforward question?
1926175 1927635 Well, certainly.

1930388 1934726 Frankly, we have had some
very reliable intelligence reports that...

1934976 1938354 quite a serious epidemic
has broken out at Clavius.

1938605 1942609 Something, apparently,
of an unknown origin.
1942859 1945236 Is this, in fact, what has happened?
1950491 1952577 I'm sorry, Dr. Smyslov, but...

1953953 1956664 I'm really not at liberty
to discuss this.
1958291 1959459 I understand.

1960918 1964130 But this epidemic
could easily spread to our base.
1964339 1966424 We should be given all the facts.

1971471 1974515 As I said,
I'm not at liberty to discuss it.

1977310 1980104 Won't you change your mind
about that drink?

1980313 1982649 No, I'm positive.
I really must be going.

1982899 1985943 I hope you and your wife come
to the IAC Conference.
1986152 1987487 I hope we can make it.

1987695 1990740 If you do, bring that darling
little daughter with you.

1990948 1994869 That'll depend on school vacations
and all that sort of thing.
1995119 1996162 If we can, we will.

1996371 1999290 You've got an invitation
if you ever get to the States.

1999499 2002251 Gregor and I will look forward
to seeing you.
2003211 2004253 Goodbye, Elena.

2004671 2007548 It's been a pleasure meeting you all.
Dr. Smyslov.

2007757 2011719 Whatever the reasons for your visit,
the very best of luck to you.
2019602 2021437 [IN FOREIGN LANGUAGE]
2192692 2194694 [INAUDIBLE DIALOGUE]
2469426 2471428 [INDISTINCT CHATTER]

2489655 2491490 PHOTOGRAPHER:
Excuse me, Dr. Halvorsen.

2491657 2493951 I'm through now.
Thank you very much, gentlemen.

2494118 2495494 [HALVORSEN]
You're welcome.

2508132 2509300 [HALVORSEN]
Well...

2509800 2512595 I know you will all
want to join with me...

2512845 2516724 in welcoming our distinguished
friend and colleague...

2516932 2521145 from the National Council
of Astronautics, Dr. Heywood Floyd.

2521395 2526525 Dr. Floyd has come up specially
to Clavius to be with us today.

2527818 2531155 Before the briefing, he'd like
to have a few words with you.

2545377 2547338 [FLOYD]
Thank you, Dr. Halvorsen.

2547588 2550424 Hi, everybody.
Nice to be back with you.

2553719 2557306 First, I bring a personal message
from Dr. Howell...

2557556 2560351 who has asked me to convey
his deep appreciation...

2560601 2563687 for the many sacrifices
you've had to make.

2563938 2567775 And, of course, his congratulations
on your discovery...

2568317 2572947 which may prove to be among the most
significant in the history of science.

2577159 2581080 I know there have been some
conflicting views...

2581330 2584959 regarding the need for
complete security in this matter.

2585167 2588879 More specifically, your opposition
to the cover story...

2589296 2592841 created to give the impression
of an epidemic at the base.

2593884 2597846 I understand that beyond it being
a matter of principle...

2598472 2601934 many of you are troubled
by the concern and anxiety...

2602184 2607273 this story of an epidemic might cause
to your relatives and friends on Earth.

2608440 2611235 I completely sympathize
with your negative views.

2612528 2616198 I find this cover story
personally embarrassing, myself.

2616991 2621287 However, I accept the need
for absolute secrecy in this.
2621996 2623872 And I hope you will too.

2626500 2629336 I'm sure you're all aware
of the grave potential...

2629545 2632214 for cultural shock
and social disorientation...
2632423 2634800 contained in this situation...

2635009 2637511 if the facts were
prematurely made public...

2637720 2640806 without adequate preparation
and conditioning.
2643100 2645311 this is the view of the Council.

2646186 2650357 The purpose of my visit is to gather
additional facts and opinions...
2650566 2652276 on the situation...

2652735 2655654 and to prepare a report
to the Council...

2655904 2660993 recommending when and how
the news should eventually be announced.

2662244 2666040 If any of you would like to give me
your views and opinions...

2666290 2671253 in private, if you like, I will be
happy to include them in my report.
2673213 2675215 Well, I think that's about it.
2676008 2677509 Any questions?

2680095 2683223 Dr. Floyd, have you any idea
how much longer...

2683432 2686226 this cover story will
have to be maintained?

2688103 2689688 [FLOYD]
I don't know, Bill.

2690105 2694068 I suppose for as long as
deemed necessary by the Council.

2694276 2697029 There must be adequate time for
a full study...

2697279 2700908 before any thought can be given
to making a public announcement.

2701116 2704036 As some of you know,
the Council has requested...

2704244 2706955 that security oaths
be obtained in writing...

2707164 2710042 from everyone who has
knowledge of this event.
2712211 2713962 Were there any more questions?

2719676 2723138 [HALVORSEN] I'm sure
we want to cooperate with Dr. Floyd...
2723305 2724807 as fully as possible...

2725349 2730479 and as there are no more questions,
we ought to get on with the briefing.

2730854 2733357 [HALVORSEN] Thank you, Dr. Floyd.
[FLOYD] Thank you.

2830871 2832164 [MICHAELS]
Anybody hungry?

2834833 2837211 [FLOYD] What've we got?
[MICHAELS] You name it.

2841089 2843383 [FLOYD] Is this chicken?
[MICHAELS] Something like that.

2843550 2845385 [MICHAELS]
Tastes the same, anyway.

2846053 2847304 [HALVORSEN]
Got any ham?

2847513 2848972 [MICHAELS]
Ham, ham, ham...

2849181 2850807 [HALVORSEN]
There, that's it.
2854061 2855103 Look pretty good.

2855312 2858065 [MICHAELS] They're getting better at it
all the time.

2860108 2861985 [HALVORSEN]
That was an excellent speech.

2862152 2863403 [MICHAELS]
It certainly was.
2864238 2866323 I'm sure it beefed up morale a lot.
2866532 2867824 Thanks, Ralph.

2868075 2870661 By the way,
you've both done a wonderful job.

2870869 2872454 I admire how
you've handled this.

2872663 2876208 [HALVORSEN] It's our job to do this thing
the way you want it done.

2876416 2879044 We're only too happy to
be able to oblige.

2879628 2881338 [MICHAELS]
Have you seen these yet?

2881630 2884967 [HALVORSEN] Have a look.
[MICHAELS] Here's what started it all.

2887219 2888679 [HALVORSEN]
When we found it...

2888845 2890847 we thought
it might be magnetic rock...

2891056 2894184 but all the geological evidence
was against it.

2894434 2899064 And not even a nickel-iron meteorite
could produce a field this intense.
2899273 2900983 So we decided to have a look.

2901191 2903735 [MICHAELS] We thought it was
part of a buried structure...

2903902 2907614 so we excavated out,
but we didn't find anything else.

2907823 2910826 [HALVORSEN] And the evidence seems
pretty conclusive that...

2911034 2914162 it hasn't been covered
by erosion or other forces.
2914371 2916707 It's been deliberately buried.
2917708 2919626 Deliberately buried.

2923171 2924923 [MICHAELS]
How about a little coffee?

2925132 2927050 [FLOYD] Great.
[HALVORSEN] Good idea.

2932556 2935517 I don't suppose you have any idea
what the damn thing is?

2935767 2937686 [HALVORSEN]
I wish to hell we did.

2938061 2942274 The only thing we're sure of is
it was buried 4 million years ago.

2942649 2947112 Well, I must say, you guys have
certainly come up with something.

2947321 2948989 [MICHAELS]
Watch this, now. It's hot.
3265722 3268224 [HIGH-PITCHED NOISE]

3533531 3534699 [NEWSCASTER]
Good evening.

3534866 3537869 Three weeks ago,
the American spacecraft Discovery One...

3538077 3540788 left on its half-billion-mile voyage
to Jupiter.

3541164 3544959 This marked the first manned attempt
to reach this distant planet.

3545210 3548671 This afternoon, The World Tonight
recorded an interview...

3548880 3553468 with the crew at a distance
of 80 million miles from Earth.

3553676 3556971 It took seven minutes for our words
to reach the giant spacecraft...

3557180 3560308 but this time delay has been edited
from this recording.

3560516 3563811 Our reporter Martin Amer
speaks to the crew.

3564020 3567190 [REPORTER] The crew of Discovery One
consists of five men...

3567398 3572362 and one of the latest generation
of the HAL 9000 computers.

3572612 3574906 Three of the men
were put aboard asleep...

3575114 3578284 or to be more precise,
in a state of hibernation.

3578493 3581412 They were Dr. Charles Hunter,
Dr. Jack Kim ball...
3581579 3583498 and Dr. Victor Kaminsky.

3583915 3586626 We spoke with mission commander,
Dr. David Bowman...
3586834 3589128 and his deputy, Dr. Frank Poole.

3589337 3592215 Good afternoon, gentlemen.
How is everything going?

3592423 3593633 [BOWMAN]
Marvelous.
3595301 3596970 We have no complaints.

3597220 3600473 I'm glad to hear that.
I'm sure the entire world...

3600682 3603935 joins me in wishing you
a safe, successful voyage.

3604102 3605979 [BOWMAN] Thanks very much.
[POOLE] Thank you.

3606396 3610358 Although hibernation has been used
on previous space efforts...

3610566 3615113 this is the first time men were
put into hibernation before departure.
3615321 3616614 Why was this done?

3616864 3620118 [BOWMAN] This was done to achieve
the maximum conservation...

3620326 3623871 of our life-support capabilities,
basically food and air.

3624080 3627709 The three hibernating crew members
represent the survey team.

3627959 3631713 Their efforts won't be utilized
until we approach Jupiter.

3632005 3635842 [REPORTER] Dr. Poole, what's it like
while you're in hibernation?

3636801 3640430 It's exactly like being asleep.
You have no sense of time.

3640638 3643099 The only difference is
that you don't dream.

3643308 3647395 [REPORTER] As I understand it, you only
breathe once a minute. Is this true?

3647603 3650231 [POOLE] Right, and the heart
beats three times a minute.

3650398 3654110 Body temperature is usually down to
about three degrees centigrade.

3654610 3657947 [REPORTER] The sixth member of the crew
was not concerned...
3658156 3660241 about the problems of hibernation...

3660450 3663911 for he was the latest result
in machine intelligence:

3664120 3668541 The HAL 9000 computer,
which can reproduce...

3668791 3671711 though some experts prefer
to use the word mimic...

3671919 3674297 most of the activities
of the human brain...

3674505 3678551 and with incalculably greater
speed and reliability.

3678760 3682347 We next spoke with
the HAL 9000 computer...

3682555 3685516 whom, we learned,
one addresses as Hal.

3686267 3688394 Hello, Hal.
How's everything going?

3688770 3692607 [HAL] Good afternoon, Mr. Amer.
Everything is going extremely well.

3692857 3696277 [REPORTER] Hal, you have an enormous
responsibility on this mission...

3696527 3700406 perhaps the greatest
of any single mission element.

3700615 3703409 You're the brain
and nervous system of the ship.

3703618 3707372 Your responsibilities include
watching over the men in hibernation.

3707580 3710666 Does this ever cause you
any lack of confidence?

3710875 3713169 [HAL]
Let me put it this way, Mr. Amer.

3713461 3718132 The 9000 Series is
the most reliable computer ever made.

3718508 3723304 No 9000 computer has ever made
a mistake or distorted information.

3723971 3727225 We are all, by any practical
definition of the words...
3727475 3730853 fool proof and incapable of error.

3731104 3734899 [REPORTER] Hal, despite your enormous
intellect, are you ever frustrated...

3735108 3738194 by your dependence on people
to carry out actions?

3738444 3740655 [HAL]
Not in the slightest bit.
3740863 3742990 I enjoy working with people.

3743241 3747787 I have a stimulating relationship
with Dr. Poole and Dr. Bowman.

3747954 3752250 My mission responsibilities range
over the entire operation of the ship...
3752667 3755628 so I am constantly occupied.

3755878 3759340 I am putting myself
to the fullest possible use...

3759549 3764303 which is all, I think, that any
conscious entity can ever hope to do.

3764929 3768141 [REPORTER] Dr. Poole, what's it like
living for most of the year...
3768391 3771227 in such close proximity with Hal?

3772228 3774188 [POOLE]
It's like what you said earlier.

3774439 3776566 He's like a sixth
member of the crew.

3776816 3780862 You quickly get adjusted to the idea
that he talks, and think of him...
3781112 3783114 really just as another person.

3783322 3787034 [REPORTER] In talking to the computer,
one gets the sense that he's capable...
3787201 3788578 of emotional responses.

3788828 3791164 When I asked him
about his abilities...

3791372 3795334 I sensed pride in his answer
about his accuracy and perfection.

3795585 3798963 Do you believe that Hal
has genuine emotions?

3799672 3802633 [BOWMAN] Well, he acts like
he has genuine emotions.

3802884 3806471 He's programmed that way
to make it easier for us to talk to him.

3806721 3808764 As to whether or not
he has feelings...

3808973 3811809 is something I don't think
anyone can truthfully answer.

3837126 3839003 [HAL]
Excuse me, Frank.
3839378 3840463 What is it, Hal?

3840630 3843591 [HAL] We've got the transmission
from your parents coming in.

3846552 3848804 Put it on here, please.
Take me in a bit.

3863486 3865446 [DAD] Hello, Frank.
[MOM] Happy birthday, darling.

3865613 3867573 [DAD] Happy birthday.
Many happy returns.

3867782 3868950 [POOLE]
A bit higher, Hal.

3869116 3871536 [DAD] Mother and I are both
feeling wonderful.

3871786 3873621 Ray and Sally were going
to be here...

3873871 3876123 but Ray's back
went bad on him again.
3876374 3878501 How do you like your cake?
3878709 3880127 Sorry you can't join us.
3880378 3881963 I ran into Bob the other day.
3882213 3884257 He said to wish you happy birthday.

3884465 3887176 All my students
send their best wishes too.
3887385 3889095 They talk about you all the time.

3889345 3892431 You're a big celebrity
in the second grade.

3892682 3894100 [MOM]
We were on TV last week.

3894350 3896978 [DAD] Your mom and I
and Dave's parents were asked...

3897228 3899480 what we thought
of our illustrious sons.

3899730 3903067 Imagine what we told them.
It's being broadcast next Thursday.
3903317 3904902 Perhaps you can listen in.

3905069 3907071 [MOM]
We're thrilled about Elaine and Bill.

3907238 3910950 I'll be glad to get the gift,
but tell me how much to spend.

3911158 3913995 [DAD] Oh, Frank,
about your AGS-19 payments...
3914245 3915871 I think I straightened it out.

3916038 3918207 I talked to
the accounting office yesterday...

3918374 3922962 and they said you'd be receiving
your higher rates of pay by next month.
3923212 3925339 I can't think of anything else to say.

3925590 3929719 [MOM] Give our love to Dave.
[DAD] Be sure to give him our regards.

3929969 3933306 [DAD] We wish you the very
happiest of birthdays.
3933556 3935141 All the best, son.

3935391 3937560 [MOM & DAD SING]
Happy birthday to you
3937810 3939895 Happy birthday to you
3940104 3942690 Happy birthday, dear Frank
3942898 3945526 Happy birthday to you.

3947278 3949322 [DAD]
See you next Wednesday.

3952450 3954327 [HAL]
Happy birthday, Frank.

3955161 3958706 Thank you, Hal.
A bit flatter, please.

3976682 3978726 [POOLE]
Anyway, queen takes pawn.

3980478 3982897 [HAL]
Bishop takes knight's pawn.

3984440 3985858 [POOLE]
Lovely move.
3990279 3991864 Rook to king one.

3992114 3994992 [HAL] I'm sorry, Frank.
I think you missed it.

3995660 3999163 Queen to bishop three.
Bishop takes queen.
3999372 4001874 Knight takes bishop. Mate.

4006128 4009298 [POOLE]
Looks like you're right. I resign.

4009465 4011467 [HAL]
Thank you for a very enjoyable game.

4011634 4012677 [POOLE]
Thank you.

4050673 4052758 [HAL] Good evening, Dave.
[BOWMAN] How are you, Hal?

4052925 4056345 Everything's running smoothly, you?
[BOWMAN] Not too bad.

4056554 4059223 - Have you been doing more work?
- A few sketches.

4059473 4061934 - May I see them?
- Sure.
4065938 4068399 That's a very nice rendering, Dave.
4069233 4071736 I think you've improved a great deal.

4072862 4075906 - Can you hold it a bit closer?
- Sure.
4078033 4080077 That's Dr. Hunter, isn't it?

4085583 4088627 do you mind if I ask you
a personal question?

4091005 4093507 Well, forgive me
for being so inquisitive...
4095551 4097636 but lately I've wondered...

4097887 4101766 whether you might be having
second thoughts about the mission?
4101974 4103642 How do you mean?
4103893 4107813 Well, it's rather difficult to define.

4108814 4112401 Perhaps I'm just projecting
my own concern about it.

4113611 4117823 I know I've never completely
freed myself of the suspicion...

4118073 4122203 that there are some extremely
odd things about this mission.

4123204 4126582 I'm sure you'll agree
there's some truth in what I say.

4129460 4131670 That's a rather difficult
question to answer.

4131879 4134548 You don't mind talking about it,
do you, Dave?

4138469 4141222 Certainly no one could
have been unaware of the very...

4141430 4144517 strange stories floating
around before we left.

4145434 4148896 Rumors about something
being dug up on the moon.

4150147 4153442 I never gave these stories
much credence...

4153651 4157822 but particularly in view of some
other things that have happened...

4158030 4160699 I find them difficult
to put out of my mind.

4163160 4167456 the way all our preparations
were kept under such tight security.

4168123 4170960 And the melodramatic touch
of putting Drs. Hunter...
4171168 4173546 Kim ball and Kaminsky aboard...

4173796 4178843 already in hibernation, after four
months of training on their own.

4179635 4182263 You working up your crew
psychology report?
4183722 4185182 Of course I am.

4185599 4189353 Sorry about this.
I know it's a bit silly.
4190062 4191647 Just a moment.
4191897 4193274 Just a moment.

4194817 4199113 I've just picked up a fault
in the AE-35 unit.

4199822 4204368 It's going to go 100-percent failure
within 72 hours.

4206287 4209039 - Is it still within operational limits?
- Yes.

4209248 4211750 And it will stay that way
until it fails.
4212084 4214003 We have 72 hours till failure?

4214253 4218132 Yes. That's a completely
reliable figure.

4219925 4222553 Then we'll bring it in.
I'll go over it with Frank...

4222761 4226473 and get on to Mission Control.
Let me have the hard copy on it.

4309765 4312434 [CONTROLLER] X-ray delta one,
this is Mission Control.
4312685 4315521 Roger your two-zero-one-three.

4315771 4318232 Sorry you fellows are having
a bit of trouble.

4318440 4323570 We're reviewing telemetric information
in our simulator and will advise.

4323821 4328033 Roger your plan to go EVA
and replace alpha-echo-three-five unit...
4328242 4329910 prior to failure.

4358063 4360149 [BOWMAN]
Prepare B-pod for EVA, Hal.
4381670 4383505 Open the pod doors, Hal.

4795250 4797878 I'm damned if I can find
anything wrong with it.
4801923 4803508 it's puzzling.

4804718 4808513 I don't think I've ever seen
anything quite like this before.
4812142 4814144 I would recommend...

4814352 4818523 that we put the unit back
in operation and let it fail.

4819232 4823111 It should then be a simple matter
to track down the cause.

4824362 4827491 We can certainly afford
to be out of communication...

4827699 4830827 for the short time
it will take to replace it.

4839544 4842297 [CONTROLLER] X-ray delta one,
this is Mission Control.
4842547 4845217 Roger your one-niner-three-zero.

4845425 4849846 We concur with your plan to replace
unit to check fault prediction.

4850096 4852724 We advise you that
our preliminary findings...

4852974 4855685 indicate that your on board
9000 computer...
4855936 4858104 is in error predicting the fault.

4858313 4861316 I say again, in error
predicting the fault.

4861566 4866071 I know this sounds rather incredible,
but this conclusion is based on...

4866279 4869574 the results from our twin
9000 computer.

4869824 4873161 We're sceptical, and we're running
cross-checking routines...

4873411 4876122 to determine reliability
of this conclusion.
4876373 4877958 Sorry about this little snag.

4878208 4881086 We'll get this info to you
as soon as we work it out.

4881294 4883463 X-ray delta one,
this is Mission Control.

4883672 4887133 Two-zero-four-nine.
Transmission concluded.

4891388 4894683 [HAL] I hope the two of you
are not concerned about this.
4896601 4898228 Are you quite sure?

4898478 4902148 - Yeah. I'd like to ask you a question.
- Of course.

4903358 4906987 How do you account for the discrepancy
between you and the twin 9000?

4907237 4910824 Well, I don't think there is
any question about it.

4911074 4914369 It can only be
attributable to human error.

4915579 4918373 This sort of thing
has cropped up before...

4918707 4922168 and it has always
been due to human error.

4927591 4929884 there's never been
any instance at all...

4930135 4933346 of a computer error
occurring in a 9000 Series, has there?
4933597 4935181 None whatsoever, Frank.

4935390 4939102 The 9000 Series has
a perfect operational record.

4939352 4943648 [POOLE] I know the wonderful
achievements of the 9000 Series, but...

4944858 4949904 Are you certain there's never been even
the most insignificant computer error?
4950155 4952115 None whatsoever, Frank.

4952490 4956161 Quite honestly, I wouldn't
worry myself about that.
4960624 4962834 Well, I'm sure you're right, Hal.
4964294 4966796 Fine. Thanks very much.

4969341 4972344 I'm having trouble
with my transmitter in C-pod.

4972594 4975180 Would you come down
and take a look at it with me?
4975388 4976514 See you later, Hal.

4998161 5000163 [BOWMAN]
Rotate C-pod, please, Hal.

5008713 5010965 [POOLE]
What sort of trouble are you having?

5011216 5013927 [BOWMAN] I've been getting some
interference in D-channel.

5014094 5015553 [POOLE]
We'll have a look at it.

5021935 5023436 [BOWMAN]
Open the door, Hal.

5042455 5044290 [BOWMAN]
Rotate pod, please, Hal.
5057637 5059723 Stop pod rotation, please, Hal.
5068148 5070150 Rotate the pod, please, Hal.
5073027 5075155 Rotate the pod, please, Hal.
5077115 5078742 I don't think he can hear us.
5078992 5081202 Rotate the pod, please, Hal.
5082662 5084748 Yeah, I'm sure we're okay.
5087959 5089335 What do you think?

5089794 5093506 - I'm not sure. What do you think?
- I've got a bad feeling about him.

5093757 5096009 - You do?
- Yeah. Definitely.
5098678 5100388 I don't know. I think so.

5101306 5105518 He's right about the 9000 Series
having a perfect operational record.

5106936 5110440 Unfortunately, that sounds
a little like famous last words.

5110690 5114986 Still, it was his idea to carry out
the failure mode analysis.

5116321 5119574 It certainly indicates his
integrity and self-confidence.
5119908 5121868 If he were wrong, that would prove it.

5122076 5124370 It would be,
if he knew he was wrong.

5126915 5130835 I can't put my finger on it,
but I sense something strange about him.

5133213 5135673 There's no reason not
to put back the unit and...

5135924 5140470 - carry on with the failure analysis.
- No, no, I agree about that.
5140720 5141888 Let's get on with it.
5142138 5144808 Okay. But, look, Dave.

5145642 5148269 Say we put the unit back
and it doesn't fail?

5148478 5151689 That would pretty well wrap it up
as far as Hal is concerned.

5153399 5156903 - We'd be in very serious trouble.
- We would, wouldn't we?
5157153 5158780 What the hell can we do?

5161783 5165870 - We wouldn't have too many alternatives.
- We wouldn't have any alternatives.

5166663 5170667 [POOLE] Every aspect of ship
operations is under his control.
5171084 5172335 If he's malfunctioning...

5172585 5175672 I don't see any choice
but disconnection.
5179384 5180927 I'm afraid I agree with you.
5181177 5183054 There'd be nothing else to do.

5184722 5187141 [BOWMAN]
It'd be a bit tricky.

5187976 5190520 We'd have to cut his
higher brain functions...

5190770 5195483 without disturbing the purely
automatic and regulatory systems.

5196734 5198444 We'd have to
work out the details...

5198653 5201614 of continuing
underground-based computer control.

5202031 5206536 Yeah. That's far safer than
allowing Hal to continue to run things.
5207245 5209247 Another thing just occurred to me.

5210748 5213334 No 9000 computer has ever
been disconnected.

5213585 5215628 No 9000 computer
has ever fouled up.
5215879 5217380 That's not what I mean.

5219549 5221759 I'm not so sure
what he'd think about it.
5226264 5229267 [INAUDIBLE DIALOGUE]

5580159 5582203 [BOWMAN]
Prepare G-pod for EVA, Hal.
5585289 5586624 Any contact with him yet?

5586874 5588668 [HAL]
The radio is still dead.

5588876 5591796 - Do you have a positive track on him?
- I have a good track.
5592046 5593464 Do you know what happened?

5593756 5596425 I'm sorry, Dave.
I don't have enough information.
5596676 5598261 Open the pod door, Hal.
5960080 5962124 [BEEPING NOISE]

6042162 6044540 [BOWMAN]
Open the pod-bay doors, please, Hal.
6052464 6054758 Open the pod-bay doors, please, Hal.
6060389 6062266 Hello, Hal, do you read me?
6065602 6067479 Hello, Hal, do you read me?
6068522 6070190 Do you read me, Hal?
6073360 6074987 Do you read me, Hal?
6077489 6079366 Hello, Hal, do you read me?
6081285 6083328 Hello, Hal, do you read me?
6083746 6085247 Do you read me, Hal?

6085497 6088250 [HAL]
Affirmative, Dave. I read you.
6091545 6093380 Open the pod-bay doors, Hal.

6094965 6098510 I'm sorry, Dave.
I'm afraid I can't do that.
6100929 6102723 What's the problem?

6103140 6106351 I think you know what the problem is
just as well as I do.
6106560 6108437 What are you talking about, Hal?

6109438 6113525 This mission is too important for me
to allow you to jeopardize it.

6114610 6116987 I don't know
what you're talking about, Hal.

6118989 6122951 I know that you and Frank
were planning to disconnect me...

6123160 6125954 and that's something
I cannot allow to happen.
6131251 6133128 Where did you get that idea, Hal?

6133670 6137800 Although you took very thorough
precautions in the pod...
6138050 6140260 against my hearing you...
6140677 6142971 I could see your lips move.
6155025 6156527 All right, Hal.

6159738 6162574 I'll go in through
the emergency air lock.
6164117 6166745 Without your space helmet, Dave...

6167246 6169706 you're going to find that
rather difficult.
6170874 6173001 Hal, I won't argue with you any more.
6173252 6174336 Open the doors.

6176797 6181260 this conversation can serve
no purpose any more. Goodbye.
6507085 6508879 [BUZZING NOISE]
6562933 6564935 [AIR WHOOSHES]
6577614 6579616 [WHOOSHING FADES]

6591127 6594381 [HAL] Just what do you think
you're doing, Dave?

6605392 6609813 I really think I'm entitled
to an answer to that question.

6626705 6630250 I know everything hasn't been
quite right with me...
6632210 6634629 but I can assure you now...
6635714 6637757 very confidently...

6639509 6642554 that it's going to be
all right again.
6646057 6648143 I feel much better now.

6659946 6663199 I can see you're
really upset about this.

6667829 6671541 I honestly think you
ought to sit down calmly...

6672167 6675503 take a stress pill
and think things over.

6680925 6685305 I know I've made some
very poor decisions recently...

6688058 6691394 but I can give you
my complete assurance...
6691644 6694689 that my work will be back to normal.

6698651 6703782 I've still got the greatest enthusiasm
and confidence in the mission...
6705325 6707619 and I want to help you.
6720215 6722842 Stop, will you?
6732936 6735355 Will you stop, Dave?
6755250 6757877 I'm afraid, Dave.
6767303 6769556 My mind is going.
6774102 6775812 I can feel it.
6781317 6783111 I can feel it.
6787073 6789159 My mind is going.
6794539 6797292 There is no question about it.
6805633 6807510 I can feel it.
6812182 6814058 I can feel it.
6817479 6819397 I can feel it.
6837373 6839417 Good afternoon...
6844005 6849135 I am a HAL 9000 computer.
6851304 6854432 I became operational...
6854807 6858645 at the HAL plant...
6858853 6861105 in Urbana, Illinois...
6861606 6866528 on the 12th of January, 1992.
6868071 6871741 My instructor was Mr. Langley...
6872367 6875286 and he taught me to sing a song.
6876996 6879457 If you'd like to hear it...
6879916 6881584 I can sing it for you.
6883086 6885922 Yes, I'd like to hear it, Hal.
6886589 6888007 Sing it for me.
6889259 6892804 It's called Daisy.

6894722 6895974 [HAL SINGS]
Daisy
6901145 6904232 Give me your answer, do
6906651 6911239 I'm half crazy
6913032 6915910 All for the love of you
6919872 6922333 A stylish marriage
6924252 6928339 I can't afford a carriage
6930633 6933052 But you'll look sweet
6933928 6936472 Upon the seat
6937807 6942604 Of a bicycle built for two

6944355 6945982 [MALE VOICE]
Good day, gentlemen.
6950612 6953072 This is a pre-recorded briefing...
6953656 6955366 made prior to your departure...

6957118 6961331 and which, for security reasons
of the highest importance...

6962290 6965793 has been known on board
during the mission...
6966044 6969756 only by your HAL 9000 computer.
6972216 6975011 Now that you are in Jupiter's space...
6975261 6977722 and the entire crew is revived...
6977972 6979766 it can be told to you.
6982518 6984771 Eighteen months ago...

6985772 6989984 the first evidence
of intelligent life off the Earth...
6990193 6991653 was discovered.

6993529 6997075 It was buried 40 feet
below the lunar surface...
6997325 6999577 near the crater Tycho.
7002372 7005458 Except for a single, very powerful...
7005708 7009587 radio emission aimed at Jupiter...

7010838 7015843 the 4-million-year-old monolith
has remained completely inert...
7017762 7020848 its origin and purpose...
7021265 7023017 still a total mystery.
8046456 8048458 [UTENSILS CLATTERING]
8253455 8255457 [HEAVY BREATHING NEARBY]

subtitles.author: m8rix
lines:
1541958 1544502 Here you are, sir.
Main level, please.
1545545 1547088 Right. See you on the way back.

1549758 1551718 - Good morning, sir.
- Morning.

1551885 1554971 - We haven't seen you for a long time.
- Nice to see you again.

1555180 1557599 - Did you have a pleasant flight?
- Very nice.

1557807 1560936 Mr. Miller of Station Security
is supposed to meet me.

1561144 1563647 - May I call him for you?
- Would you? Here he is.

1563855 1565190 - Hello, Dr. Floyd.
- Hello, Miller.

1565398 1567359 - Sorry I'm late.
- That's all right.
1567567 1569527 It's nice to have you back.

1569736 1571988 - Did you have a good flight?
- Very nice.

1572197 1574991 - Shall we go through?
- Would you please use number 17?

1575200 1577953 - Thank you, Ms. Turner. This way.
- Thank you.
1583500 1586002 Welcome to Voiceprint Identification.
1586253 1590340 When you see the red light go on, please state in the following order:
1590590 1594678 Your destination, your nationality and your full name.
1594928 1597722 Surname first, Christian name, and initial.
1599391 1603728 Moon. American. Floyd, Heywood R.
1606231 1609776 Thank you. You are cleared through Voiceprint Identification.

1618743 1621913 - Have I got time for breakfast?
- I think we can manage that.
1622122 1623206 How long have I got?

1623373 1625917 Your flight leaves
in an hour and 10 minutes.

1626084 1629546 I've reserved a table for you
in the Earthlight Room.

1629754 1633008 It's been seven or eight months
since you were here, hasn't it?
1633216 1635302 Let's see. Yeah, about eight months.

1635510 1638096 I suppose you saw the work
on the new section?

1638263 1640807 - Coming along great, huh?
- Yeah, it's fine.

1642183 1645854 I've got to make a couple calls.
I'll meet you in the restaurant.

1677969 1681389 Hi, squirt.
What are you doing?
1684142 1685602 Where's Mummy?
1685852 1687312 Gone to shopping.
1687562 1690023 - Who's taking care of you? - Rachel.
1690231 1693651 - May I speak to Rachel, please? - She's gone to the bathroom.
1693902 1696613 Are you coming to my party tomorrow?
1696863 1699282 I'm sorry, sweetheart, but I can't.
1701034 1703620 Well, you know, Daddy's traveling.
1704162 1706498 Very sorry about it, but I just can't.

1707624 1710668 I'm going to send you
a very nice present, though.
1713380 1715548 - Anything special that you want? - Yes.
1719177 1721346 We've got lots of telephones already.

1721554 1725892 Can't you think of anything else
for your birthday? Something special?

1729187 1731731 A bush baby?
We'll have to see about that.

1731940 1735693 I want you to tell Mummy
something for me. Will you remember?
1735902 1738863 Tell Mummy that I telephoned. Okay?

1740448 1743326 And that I'll try
to telephone again tomorrow.
1743576 1745495 Now, will you tell her that?
